title: siroinu
author: siroinu
content: ShiroGo: New Move To Earn Project Let's Go With Shiro.ü•æUsers can earn $SIRO by Walking, Jogging, or running outdoors using NFT Sneakers.New PinkSale (19th May, 2 Pm UTC): https://www.pinksale.finance/#/launchpad/0xEbDf6C28FDF518B553caDE6Cc5555533557B06B4?chain=BSCParticipate in IDO Whitelist: https://gleam.io/zDvoB/shiro-go-ido-whitelist-competition$SIRO Utilities:1) Buy/Sell NFTs2) Upgrade & Level Up3) Customize4) Challenge & Special EventUpcoming AMAs: ‚ñ™Ô∏è18th May, 1 PM UTC (BlackSAFU (https://t.me/BlockSAFUofficial))‚ñ™Ô∏è19th May, 12 PM UTC (PinkSale (http://t.me/pinkecosystem))We Passed Audit with 97% Score: Report Check Here¬†(https://github.com/blocksafu111/audit/blob/main/ShiroGo-Audit-by-BlockSAFU.pdf)Chinese Community: https://t.me/ShiroGoChineseAudited (https://github.com/blocksafu111/audit/blob/main/ShiroGo-Audit-by-BlockSAFU.pdf) | KYCed (https://www.coinscope.co/coin/siro/kyc) | Doxxed Dev (https://www.coinscope.co/coin/siro)| Move 2 Earn (http://shirogo.org/)|Shiro Go:üî•Telegram Ann (https://telegram.me/ShiroGoNews)| Telegram Chat (https://telegram.me/ShiroGoDiscussion)| Twitter (https://twitter.com/ShiroGoApp/)|Website (https://shirogo.org/)|

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: The Move-2-Earn hype continues. It is a pity that so far almost all projects are limited to the blockchain Binance, at first glance this project is another clone of STEPN, which is not surprising. After all, it is the only one that was able to raise a billion-dollar capitalization.And what will be the pre-sale price? I could not find this information anywhere, unfortunately.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Another new move to earn again. I see that on CMC there are so many new move to earn has been coming up with the various features. These features are not so innovative as stepn. Almost all of new move to earn in the market was earning the same mechanism or i would like to say that fully copying the features that already introduced by stepn. Some only legit move to earn while the rest was actually scam project or money grabber

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Another pointless coin amongst the sea of crud.¬† How many copy/paste ideas do we need here?¬† I'd be surprised if the same "team" isn't behind all of these coins coming out.¬† But just like with everything else, people will buy it and eventually lose money.¬† Wash rinse repeat.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: wheelz1200 on May 16, 2022, 11:30:53 PMAnother pointless coin amongst the sea of crud. ¬†How many copy/paste ideas do we need here? ¬†I'd be surprised if the same "team" isn't behind all of these coins coming out. ¬†But just like with everything else, people will buy it and eventually lose money. ¬†Wash rinse repeat.and even if the dev team doxxed themselves, it won't stop them from gaining from this project. now, it is the question on how long they can survive in this market? they have other competitors but their longevity depends on the team themselves. how serious are they on this project or just riding the hype of the move-to-earn platforms?it is also a question of how many people will use their app? can they attract individuals who are having a healthy lifestyle? how can they attract these people to use their app?
